Good day,

Thank you for contacting Universal SkyVIP Services.
In order to provide you with correct information please kindly share the number of passengers, amount of luggage and airport where service is needed.
Best regards,
{lead_first_name} Ortega
SkyVIP Team 
Office: +1(855)575-9847 
info@usvipservices.com 
www.usvipservices.com
General cancellation policy: service fee is non-refundable for cancellations within 24 hours of the scheduled service, and no-shows will be charged the full service fee. Cancellation notices between 24-48 hours prior to the service are subject to a 50% charge. Modifications must be done at least 24 hours in advance of the scheduled service and may be subject to additional fees up to 100% of the value of the booking. In such circumstances, any service fees already paid to SkyVIP Services will be non-refundable. A transaction processing fee of 4% will be deducted from all refunds.
Please be aware that our cancellation policies for Amsterdam, Australia airports, Providenciales, Japan airports, and all VIP Tarmac services differ from our general policy. For more information, please refer to our terms and conditions at  https://usvipservices.com/terms-and-conditions/ 
All reservation fees for VIP Tarmac Services arranged through either VIP Terminal or VIP Lounge are non-refundable and non-transferable. If you make a reservation less than 28 hours before your scheduled travel time, a surcharge of 50% will apply. Additionally, any changes to a reservation made between 28 and 48 hours before travel will incur an extra charge of 50%. If a cancellation is made more than 48 hours before the scheduled travel time, 50% of the reservation cost will be applied as a credit towards a future reservation. However, please note that this credit does not constitute a credit or refund of any kind and the original reservation fees remain non-refundable. Exceptions may be made for airline cancellations or changes with proper documentation. Please review our terms and conditions before utilizing our services.

General cancellation policy: service fee is non-refundable for cancellations within 24 hours of the scheduled service, and no-shows will be charged the full service fee. Cancellation notices between 24-48 hours prior to the service are subject to a 50% charge. Modifications must be done at least 24 hours in advance of the scheduled service and may be subject to additional fees up to 100% of the value of the booking. In such circumstances, any service fees already paid to SkyVIP Services will be non-refundable. A transaction processing fee of 4% will be deducted from all refunds.
Please be aware that our cancellation policies for Amsterdam, Australia airports, Providenciales, Japan airports, and all VIP Tarmac services differ from our general policy. For more information, please refer to our terms and conditions at  https://usvipservices.com/terms-and-conditions/ 
All reservation fees for VIP Tarmac Services arranged through either VIP Terminal or VIP Lounge are non-refundable and non-transferable. If you make a reservation less than 28 hours before your scheduled travel time, a surcharge of 50% will apply. Additionally, any changes to a reservation made between 28 and 48 hours before travel will incur an extra charge of 50%. If a cancellation is made more than 48 hours before the scheduled travel time, 50% of the reservation cost will be applied as a credit towards a future reservation. However, please note that this credit does not constitute a credit or refund of any kind and the original reservation fees remain non-refundable. Exceptions may be made for airline cancellations or changes with proper documentation. Please review our terms and conditions before utilizing our services.

On Sep 25, 2023 at 10:14 PM -0400, Taylor Bowdin < tbowdin@reposite.io>, wrote: 
Hi Dan, 
Thanks for your response and your willingness to share honest feedback - it's greatly appreciated and helps us constantly improve! 
Tim is indeed part of our onboarding team which assists with first quote requests, while I'm your point of contact for membership. 
In terms of our commission, with the free tier, if you were to win a booking from a quote request sent via Reposite, we would collect a 15% commission from the final billed amount. However, the benefit of our full membership (for an annual rate of $500) is that all commissions on bookings are completely waived for a year. This rate is our lowest available given that you've been invited by a planner on the platform. 
The full membership also includes amplified visibility to our network of over 2,100 group travel and event planners, unlimited access to respond to all RFPs, and higher ranking of responses on all RFPs. Additionally, members get to utilize our tools and resources to proactively shape and expand their planner partnerships. 
Compared to free tier users, full members get a 24 hour head start to submit quotes and respond - an advantage given that approximately 50% of all bookings on Reposite are awarded to the suppliers who respond within the first 24 hours. 
Are there specific goals you have in mind for your group business in the coming months? 
Best, 
Taylor

In terms of our commission, with the free tier, if you were to win a booking from a quote request sent via Reposite, we would collect a 15% commission from the final billed amount. However, the benefit of our full membership (for an annual rate of $500) is that all commissions on bookings are completely waived for a year. This rate is our lowest available given that you've been invited by a planner on the platform. 
The full membership also includes amplified visibility to our network of over 2,100 group travel and event planners, unlimited access to respond to all RFPs, and higher ranking of responses on all RFPs. Additionally, members get to utilize our tools and resources to proactively shape and expand their planner partnerships. 
Compared to free tier users, full members get a 24 hour head start to submit quotes and respond - an advantage given that approximately 50% of all bookings on Reposite are awarded to the suppliers who respond within the first 24 hours.

Best, 
Taylor

Hey Alexa - that's great news! As you know, you're currently on the basic plan, which is how you were able to see and respond to this lead. I'm certainly crossing my fingers for you, but in full transparency non-members only get notified of the quote 24 hours after it's been posted. Given that over half of the bookings on Reposite are awarded to suppliers who respond within the first 24 hours of an inquiry (the head start is a perk only reserved for members), you're at a bit of a disadvantage if you stay on the basic plan - though anything is possible of course! 
OpenTable is great for B2C business, but the Reposite membership is designed to bring consistent group business from professional travel and event planners (our average group size stands at 72 currently). Brendan & Anand may have already mentioned this, but it's worth noting that since you were identified by a planner through Reposite, you actually qualify for a full year of membership at the $500 annual rate (lowest available), which also waives all commissions from successful bookings. Thanks Erika, and apologies for any confusion. Happy to provide a little more context -

Reposite is a marketplace connecting travel & event professionals to sought after suppliers like yourself. Through Reposite you can gain access to hundreds of new travel & event planners who are planning trips in your area. Through our Membership program ($500 annually), you receive matching inbound leads and group planner partnerships with all commissions and fees waived. It's worth noting that our average group size is 72, and we've seen a pickup in activity in the Asheville area recently. It's a no brainer if you're looking to grow your pipeline of repeatable group business. 

Do you have other tools/platforms that you use to drive group business to Center for Craft?

On Thu, Sep 28, 2023 at 3:02 PM Taylor Bowdin <tbowdin@reposite.io> wrote:
Totally understand, though as a heads up, this is definitely limiting your ability to work with B2B professional travel and event planners, who tend to send consistent, repeatable business to suppliers that they're able to work with easily. To put into perspective, sending requests and receiving responses via email generally works well for B2C business, but most professional travel and event planners won't engage directly (imagine having to submit forms and leave voicemails for every aspect of an itinerary - restaurants, activities, transportation, hotel, etc. on individual business websites!). 
For reference, our average group size that we see come through the platform is 72, so if this is the type of lead that you're looking to grow within the business, then the membership is a no brainer @ $500 for the year (our lowest available rate, since you were identified by a planner through Reposite. As part of the membership, all commissions are waived, you get invited to networking events with some of the largest planners in the industry, and you instantly get added to the searchable supplier databases of the 2.1k+ planners within the Reposite network. 
My colleague Dan runs office hours / Q&A sessions twice a week to answer any questions. Here are the sign up links  for Tuesdays and Thursdays. Let me know once you pick a date/time so I can give him a heads up.
Taylor
--

For reference, our average group size that we see come through the platform is 72, so if this is the type of lead that you're looking to grow within the business, then the membership is a no brainer @ $500 for the year (our lowest available rate, since you were identified by a planner through Reposite.
